xml.p: Rainy_Day_0: "I've changed a lot over the years, but I still prefer sunny weather." #!String
Rainy_Day_1: "Sometimes I daydream about our retirement... relaxing on the sunny beaches of the Fern Islands!#$e#Do you ever think about the future, @?" #!String
Rainy_Day_2: "Good morning! I got up early and baked something sweet for you! [223 234 211 651 731]#$e#I know you're strong, but you still need to eat well to stay at your best!$h" #!String
Rainy_Day_3: "I can't go outside today... my hair will go limp. Forgive me, dear.$s#$e#I want to look my best for you." #!String
Rainy_Day_4: "Are you going out in this weather? Just make sure to wipe your boots on the way back in, honey.#$e#I'll just stay here and do some housework." #!String
patio_Haley: "Say 'goat cheese'!" #!String
Rainy_Day_Haley: "Oh no... If this weather keeps up I'll get so pale.$s" #!String
Rainy_Night_0: "Oh, I'm glad you're back. It's so cold in here by myself... Are you almost ready to shut off the lights?" #!String
Rainy_Night_1: "I hope it's nice and sunny tomorrow morning. Too much rain can make me moody.$s" #!String
Rainy_Night_2: "I hope Emily isn't too lonely all by herself. I should visit her again soon.$7" #!String
Rainy_Night_3: "Rain is horrible for a photographer. The lighting is awful, and you can't go outside without ruining your equipment!$s" #!String
Rainy_Night_4: "I made a hot meal for you, honey. Lots of spice, just how you like it. Enjoy! [727 231 207 199]$h" #!String
Rainy_Night_5: "I never thought I'd say this, but the country lifestyle really suits me.$h" #!String
Rainy_Night_Haley: "Hi, honey. I'm so glad you're home. I was starting to get kind of lonely.$l" #!String
Indoor_Day_0: "Good morning! Did you sleep well?$h#$e#I think I might break out the old camera today... the lighting is just perfect." #!String
Indoor_Day_1: "Good morning, dear! Smells good, doesn't it? I made you breakfast! [194 195 210 211 216]#$e#I know you're busy with your work. I'm here to support you in any way I can!" #!String
Indoor_Day_2: "Did you sleep okay? You were snoring a little.$h#$e#I've got some chores to do in here. Have a good day." #!String
Indoor_Day_3: "I'm glad I've learned to enjoy cleaning! The house gets dirty very easily.$10#$e#It's satisfying to get everything squeaky clean.#$e#Can I have a kiss before you leave?$11" #!String
Indoor_Day_4: "Good morning, dear. Another day of farm chores, huh?#$e#I'll be thinking of you. <$h" #!String
Indoor_Day_Haley: "I felt like I had no direction in life before I met you. Now I have exactly what I want.$l" #!String
Indoor_Night_Haley: "You look like you've been working hard, dear. Let me help you de-stress.$l" #!String
Outdoor_0: "I always feel best when I'm outside, breathing fresh air.#$b#Don't get me wrong, your grandpa's old cottage is very nice! But nothing beats this beautiful landscape." #!String
Outdoor_1: "We've got to make sure the farm is cute! That might be important... right, honey?" #!String
Outdoor_2: "Hi, honey! If I knew more about farm work I'd help you out more. Sorry!#$e#I'll be thinking of you.$h" #!String
Outdoor_3: "I'm just going to do some dusting over here. That should help you out, right?#$e#*phew*... it's hot out here." #!String
Outdoor_4: "Don't overwork yourself, dear.#$e#Make sure and take a break every now and then, or get something to eat.$h" #!String
Outdoor_Haley: "Looks like a good day to work on my tan, don't you think, sweetheart?" #!String
funLeave_Haley: "I'm going to socialize in town for a bit today." #!String
funReturn_Haley: "It was nice seeing everyone in town. Did you have a good day, dear?" #!String
OneKid_3: "Isn't it strange? I'm not used to being a mother." #!String
TwoKids_2: "Isn't %kid2 a very good-looking baby?" #!String
TwoKids_3: "A big house, two kids, and a beautiful plot of land. I'm not sure what else I could ask for." #!String
spring_2: "So, what are we planting this season?" #!String
spring_1: "Now that winter's over, we've got lots of sunny weather to look forward to. I'm excited." #!String
summer_3: "Sorry if I don't look my best... the air is just so humid that my hair doesn't hold up too well." #!String
summer_15: "It's summer... that means the house is full of flies and ants... yuck.$s" #!String
fall_2: "I already miss summer..." #!String
fall_1: "Fall is kind of sad for me... everything is dying.$5" #!String
winter_14: "My skin feels so dry in this weather." #!String
winter_2: "For some reason, the snowy weather gives me cravings for pink cake..." #!String
spring_Haley: "Aren't you glad winter's over, honey? Things seem more hopeful now." #!String
summer_Haley: "I love watching the fireflies on a hot summer's night. It's the closest I'll ever come to visiting the stars." #!String
fall_Haley: "Even though I prefer summer, fall might be the best season to take pictures. Those long, low shadows..." #!String
winter_Haley: "I was just thinking about the time you helped me open a jar of pickles. Remember that?$h#$e#We've come a long way since then.$l" #!String
